resources.string: Skin Health helps to detect amount of acne on your face and recommends procedures suitable for you
Choose the way to upload an image

Drink enough water (normally 6-8 glasses per day)
Include healthy fats (avocado, oily fish)
 Minimize milk products
Include enough Omega-3and Omega-6 products (chia seeds, oily fish, rapeseed oil, walnuts)
 Eat more low glycaemic index carbs (beans, pulses, porridge, and other low-GI)
 Reduce high glycaemic index carbs (sugar, sugary drinks, chocolate, cookies, and others)

Drink enough water (normally 6-8 glasses)
Include healthy fats (avocado, oily fish) 
Include enough Omega-3and Omega-6 products (chia seeds, oily fish, rapeseed oil, walnuts) 
Eat more low glycaemic index carbs (beans, pulses, porridge, and other low-GI) 
Reduce high glycaemic index carbs (sugar, sugary drinks, chocolate, cookies,fastfood, and others) 
Reduce lactose (milk products)

It is highly recommended to see a therapist and dermatologist
 Drink enough water (normally 6-8 glasses per day) 
Include healthy fats (avocado, oily fish) 
Include enough Omega-3and Omega-6 products (chia seeds, oily fish, rapeseed oil, walnuts) 
Eat more low glycaemic index carbs (beans, pulses, porridge, and other low-GI) 
Exclude high glycaemic index carbs

You should see the doctors: therapist, dermatologist, endocrinologist, cosmetologist

 Exclude high glycaemic index carbs 
(sugar, chocolate, fastfood, and others)
